body:
Yup, for the first time in like.. years, FMA has dropped its first spot on MAL. Kimi no Na wa (Your name) which was directed by the almighty Makoto Shinkai replaced FMA.

It's a movie, and I watched it recently; I absolutely loved the art and animation. It's fair to say it's my favourite anime now. Plot was unique (the romance aspect wasn't) but wow
What are your thoughts on it?
